ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: it is very useful.  once your skill gets to 80+ you will rarely fail.  the key is stop attacking and run away for 1-5 secs and then feign :)  your mileage will
ygData.messageBody:
it is very useful. once your skill gets to 80+ you will rarely fail. the key
is stop attacking and run away for 1-5 secs and then feign :) your mileage
will vary and you will start to get a feeling for it soon enough. beware or
casters, if they have already started casting on you don't feign. wait until
the spell hits you and then feign (because if they hit you they know you aren't
dead) :)

hope this helps, took me many deaths and a long time to learn the above
lessons... good luck!

Azeru, 24th Monk of Povar

--- Seth Young <lambastic@...> wrote:
> From: Seth Young <lambastic@...>
>
> Has anyone ever found the feign death skill to be actually useful in getting
> creatures that are attacking you to stop? I have been practicing non-stop
> since I got the skill and it is now at 50, but fighting crocodiles and
> caiman, not once has feigning death, whether i fell to the ground or not,
> stopped them from biting me. Is there something about the use of the skill
> that I am missing or is it just not that useful?
>
>
